item.description: Happy New Year to all and we are having one big party to ring in 2012. They'll be 4 other meet up groups coming and last years party had over 200 people. It's only $20 per person and tables can be reserved. Xtra Large Dance Floor / Plenty of Appetizers to pick on / Great DJ playing all your favorite dance tunes / Lots of fun friendly people having a good time / Party Favors / Proper dress required. No jeans, sneakers, t's etc. This is one of the most popular events around and they'll be people from all over attending. You can register for a chance to get in free at www.WhatsAngeloDoing.com by sending them your email address.
item.name: Happy New Year Dance Party & Mingle
